alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County; Converse County Lower Elevations; East Platte County; North Laramie Range (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 29 at 2:02PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Albany, northwestern Platte and south central Converse Counties through 245 PM MDT... At 202 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Curtis Gulch Campground, or 26 miles southwest of Douglas, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Esterbrook around 230 PM MDT. Esterbrook Campground around 235 PM MDT. Harris Park around 240 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM MDT for southeastern and east central Wyoming.

area.areaDesc: Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County; Converse County Lower Elevations; East Platte County; North Laramie Range
